ugh, this is again because of the anaconda folks writing somewhat faulty packaging. I am in touch with them to resolve this next week. Here's what you have to do to fix this:

conda uninstall pytorch
conda uninstall libtorch
pip uninstall torch
pip uninstall torch # yes twice

And then now freshly install pytorch with the commands from pytorch.org (dont do conda install pytorch, do conda install pytorch cuda80 -c soumith

body:
ugh, this is again because of the anaconda folks writing somewhat faulty packaging. I am in touch with them to resolve this next week. Here's what you have to do to fix this:

```
conda uninstall pytorch
conda uninstall libtorch
pip uninstall torch
pip uninstall torch # yes twice
```

And then now freshly install pytorch with the commands from pytorch.org (dont do `conda install pytorch`, do `conda install pytorch cuda80 -c soumith`
